AnotherButton.changelog:
# 1.1.0 - The "Deep Dive" Update 🌊✨
* 🧭 **Breadcrumbs:** Fixed navigation in deep nested folders (Folder > Folder > Folder). The back button now properly remembers your history!
* 🔢 **Smart Defaults:** New buttons now automatically count up (1, 2, 3...) and default to **Discord Grey** (`#4f545c`).
* 🎒 **Starter Kit:** Engine optimized for the new "Panda Starter Kit" imports.
* 🛁 **Polish:** Improved stability for Drag & Drop reordering.

# 1.0.9 - Quality of Life 🛠️
* 🔄 **Reorder:** Long-press button cards to drag & drop.
* 📐 **Sizing:** Added size settings for Main Button & Popup items.
* 🔽 **Dropdowns:** Added `{Name:Opt1,Opt2}` variable support.
* 💡 **Tips:** Added a random tips section in Settings.

# 1.0.8 - Pixel Perfect 🎨
* 🌈 **Color Picker:** Added Wheel, RGB sliders & Presets.
* 📐 **Responsive:** UI now scales perfectly (DP).
* 🎛️ **Redesign:** Cleaner, compact settings menu.
* 🐛 **Fixes:** Fixed button showing in Search/Emoji bars.

# 1.0.7 - Visual Polish 📱
* 🤏 **Compact:** Slimmer popup menu style.
* ✨ **Effects:** Added ripple and hover feedback.
* 🛠️ **Stability:** General layout improvements.

# 1.0.6 - Power User 📂
* 📁 **Folders:** Create nested sub-menus.
* 👻 **Opacity:** Setting now affects the whole menu.
* 🧱 **Layout:** Better 2-column grid for settings.

# 1.0.5 - Customization 🧩
* 📝 **Templates:** Added `{Variable}` input support.
* 🎨 **Colors:** Custom colors per button.
* 🔠 **Keywords:** New `[Math]`, `[Dice]` syntax.
* 🛡️ **Safety:** Added delete confirmation dialogs.

# 1.0.4 - Context 🌍
* 🔒 **Lock:** Restrict buttons to specific Servers/Channels.

# 1.0.3 - Protection 💾
* ⚠️ **Safety:** Added "Unsaved Changes" indicator.

# 1.0.2 - Control ⚙️
* 🔧 **Config:** Individual button configuration.

# 1.0.1 - Backup 🔄
* 💾 **Auto-Save:** Implemented background saving.

# 1.0.0 - Liftoff 🚀
* 🎉 **Launch:** Initial release.
